successes.title: Dwarven Forge's Caverns-Dwarvenite Game Tiles Terrain
successes.description: Dwarven Forge presents Caverns – beautifully handcrafted, durable, affordable and completely modular gaming terrain.

Pledges.description: WATCHER: A big thank you from Dwarven Forge!
CONTRIBUTOR: Your DF Forum account will boast a Cavern Set backer graphic.
GAMER: Contributor Rewards + a canvas Dwarven Forge Tote Bag. Your $25 pledge includes free shipping ($10 value) within the US.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

1 CAVERN SET (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 1 Cavern set (9 straight walls, 9 floors, 8 corner walls). Infused (inside and out) with “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also add detail with your own paints. Your $75 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($15 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

1 CAVERN SET (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards + 1 Cavern set (9 straight walls, 9 floors, 8 corner walls) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors. Your $110 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($15 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

2 CAVERN SETS (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 2 Cavern sets (18 straight walls, 18 floors, 16 corner walls). Infused (inside and out) with “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also add detail with your own paints. Your $145 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($25 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

2 CAVERN SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards + 2 Cavern sets (18 straight walls, 18 floors, 16 corner walls) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors.  Your $205 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($25 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

3 CAVERN SETS (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 3 Cavern sets (27 straight walls, 27 floors, 24 corner walls). Infused (inside and out) with “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also add detail with your own paints. Your $210 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($35 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

3 CAVERN SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards + 3 Cavern sets (27 straight walls, 27 floors, 24 corner walls.) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors. Your $285 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($35 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

5 CAVERN SETS (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 5 Cavern sets (45 straight walls, 45 floors, 40 corner walls). Infused (inside and out) with Dwarven Forge “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also add detail with your own paints. Your $325 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($55 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

5 CAVERN SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards + 5 Cavern sets (45 straight walls, 45 floors, 40 corner walls) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors. Your $455 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($55 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

10 CAVERN SETS (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 10 Cavern sets (90 straight walls, 90 floors, 80 corner walls). Infused (inside and out) with Dwarven Forge “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also add detail with your own paints. Your $615 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($110 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

10 CAVERN SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards +10 Cavern sets (90 straight walls, 90 floors, 80 corner walls) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors. Your $875 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($110 value) within the USA.  Recipients outside the US are responsible for any import duties/fees.

GRAND MASTER PATRON: 10 CAVERN SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED) + D&D fun with Stefan: (Stefan Pokorny) will run you (and up to 7 of your friends) through a marathon D&D adventure -- plus a few other surprises.  This is your chance to game with a legend! The Reward Level does not cover any travel or hotel, but Stefan will buy you (and up to 7 friends) food and drinks. Must be redeemed by Dec 15, 2014. (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)
Stefan is so overwhelmed by the support by this great gaming community that he is feeling adventurous....
